ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics
Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.CommentController

public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object

The CommentController class is what helps distinguish between a new reply or a new top level comment. As well as it updates the data to and from the comment as it is modified and pushes it back to the server.

          Constructor

Constructor

Method Detail

newTopLevel

public void newTopLevel(CommentModel newComment)
Creates a new top level comment. The comment is pushed to the web and added to the local my comments list.

Parameters:
newComment - The new top level comment.

newReply

public void newReply(CommentModel newComment,
                     Context context)
Creates a new Reply Level comment. The comment is pushed to the web and added to the local my comments list.

Parameters:
newComment - an absolute URL giving the base location of the image
context - An activity context

updateComment

public void updateComment(CommentModel comment,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String author,
                          java.lang.String body,
                          Bitmap picture,
                          Location mGeolocation)
Replaces the contents of a comment with new ones and pushes the new comment online.

Parameters:
comment - The comment with its old attributes.
title - New title
author - New author name
body - New body
picture - New picture
mGeolocation - New comment location
